title: Need a movie
body: Anyone got a good movie to suggest? needs some nudity maybe a S Scene thx.

replies.body:
A Serbian Film

Excellent wholesome family entertainment. 
(just a tad of nudity)
Seen it, great film. Loved it.

the return of the total nude babes on cannibal island 2

best movie i ever saw
If you're after a S scene do reality.. find a 60 minute reality scene, theirs your movie and 'alone time' material in one.
